showScoreExcerpt: “There’s a fizz that bubbles up near the end of a door-slamming farce when the characters, one by one, have to explain to one another what’s actually going on...’The Cottage' tries to emphasize the fizz, but nobody remembered to shake the soda can beforehand. It’s full of explanations, light on mess.”
